text.data: [character][0x1]: Great Dragon Bahamut! I have come.[end]T
The thing my late father couldn't do... Reaching into your mind...[end]M
My strengths... My weaknesses... Hiding nothing, I have come...[end]N
Now, Bahamut![end]B
Bahamut: Dragnar [character][0x1]...[end][0x0]

O, Holy Dragons inside me! Accept Bahamut!
If you cannot yield your anger... If your hatred will not end... Fight inside me! But I will not let you do as you please![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Dragnar? Am I a Dragnar?[end]B
Bahamut: Indeed...[end]V
Valitora... Leviathan... Garuda... Jormungand... And Hyperion...[end]T
Their anger... their sadness... All that is within their minds...[end]Y
Yet, you have not lost your own mind, girl...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Me... A Dragnar...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Please tell me... The true meaning of the legend of the Holy Dragons...[end]B
Bahamut: The one who speaks with the Holy Dragons shall open the door to a new era...[end]A
A new era... The era of the revival of we Holy Dragons...[end]A

A Dragnar shall be the one who to lead us to that era...
It is your destiny...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: If you revive... Will you... fight?[end]B

Bahamut: The new era... Even we cannot see it...
The one who will lead us there... Is you...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: But... what should I do?[end]B
Bahamut: Combine our minds... into one...[end]O

Our hatred-filled minds... Make them one...
Then... the door shall open completely... Dragnar... can you do this?[end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: I'll try...
Okay... Bahamut...[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1]!![end]S
Sendak: We must carry the princess to the castle quickly![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: No... To [character][0x1]...[end]P
Palpaleos: But [character][0x1]![end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: To [character][0x1]...
We will... take off soon. The door... will open...
The Holy Dragons will open the door... Everybody... to Altair...
[character][0x1]... Please get repatre[0x9]...[end][end]
